alert.note: Alert for Duval; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:01AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Duval, northeastern Webb, southeastern La Salle, McMullen and west central Live Oak Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 301 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Fowlerton to 17 miles west of Loma Alta to 10 miles south of Fort Ewell Site. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Freer, Tilden, Seven Sisters, Loma Alta, Zella and Fowlerton. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 770 and 786. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for south central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Duval; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
